Class LexicalUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ox.krr.logmap2.lexicon.LexicalUtilities

  • public class LexicalUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the lexical variants provided by WordNet, UMLSLexicon, Stemmers and number normalization
    Author:
    Ernesto Jimenez-Ruiz Created: Sep 11, 2011
